intro: Oddoniodendron micranthum, commonly known as the small-flowered oddoniodendron, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Rubiaceae. It is characterized by its compact growth habit and small, clustered flowers that typically bloom in shades of white or pale yellow. The plant has simple, opposite leaves that are usually elliptical or ovate in shape. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in tropical and subtropical regions. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species in its native habitat.
